## map() function

Asynchronously map the values in an array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function map<T1, T2>(array: T1[], callback: (value: T1, index: number, array: T1[]) => Observable<T2>): Observable<T2[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>T1[]</code> |  |
|  callback | <code>(value: T1, index: number, array: T1[]) =&gt; Observable&lt;T2&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Observable<T2[]>`
